text: Hi All! Can we replace the HubSpot grid system with Bootstrap Grid? If yes then please guide me How can I achieve that.

Hi all!!! Modules like menus, copyright, etc that are not meant to be dragged into the page editor have been hidden via is_available_for_new_content. Its value has been set to false. If a user mistakenly deletes such a component from the global editor, how he is going to add the deleted module again if its visibility is hidden. Can anyone provide me with a solution to this?
How do you guys prevent your global theme styles from leaking into the HubSpot page editor tool styles?
